p:
Experiment 2 produced CO 2 and temperature trajectories that strongly resembled those found in Experiment 1 (see Fig 4C and 4D). Uninformed participants produced poorer environmental outcomes than Informed participants. Mirroring Experiment 1, there were main effects of Information Condition for both CO 2, F (1, 108) = 23.65, MS
e = 299014.48, p < .001, η
p
2 = .18, and temperature, F (1, 108) = 24.33, MS
e = 24.84, p < .001, η

2 = .18.
